name: tm20
effect: Teaches Safeguard to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Safeguard to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Endure Gen I: Rage)

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Prevents status
abnormality with a
mystical power.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Prevents status
abnormality with a
mystical power.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
It protects the
user’s party from
all status problems
for five turns.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user creates a protective field
that prevents status problems like
poison, paralysis, burn, and sleep.

The user creates a protective field
that prevents status problems like

flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark
thoughts. This may also make the target flinch.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user attacks everything around it by causing an
explosion. The user faints upon using this move.
